summary: This document consists of a series of communications from Sprint Corporate Security to the Palm Beach Police Department, providing requested subscriber information related to an ongoing investigation. The records include details about various mobile accounts and their billing information, as well as instructions for handling the records in a legal context.

persons.name: Eugene McFarlan
persons.context: Eugene McFarlan is the sender of the correspondence from Sprint Corporate Security, providing requested information to the Palm Beach Police Department.

persons.name: Dennis Duckett
persons.context: Dennis Duckett is mentioned as a contact for T-Mobile USA in response to a subpoena from the Palm Beach Police Department.

persons.name: Joe Recarvey
persons.context: Detective Joe Recarvey is referenced in the correspondence as a recipient of information related to the investigation.

persons.name: Joe Roney
persons.context: Detective Joe Roney is mentioned in the context of a subpoena for subscriber information related to the investigation.

persons.name: Detective
persons.context: A generic reference to a detective from the Palm Beach Police Department involved in the investigation.

connections.description: Eugene McFarlan, as part of Sprint Corporate Security, is providing information to Detective Joe Recarvey of the Palm Beach Police Department.
Dennis Duckett, representing T-Mobile USA, is responding to a subpoena from Detective Joe Recarvey.
Both Joe Roney and Joe Recarvey are detectives working for the Palm Beach Police Department involved in the same investigation.

events.title: Subpoena Issued
events.description: A subpoena was issued to T-Mobile USA requesting customer identification and account information.

events.title: Information Provided
events.description: Sprint Corporate Security provided requested subscriber information to the Palm Beach Police Department.

locations: Palm Beach Police Department, 345 South County Road, Palm Beach, FL 33480
Sprint Corporate Security, 6480 Sprint Parkway, Overland Park, KS 66251
keyFacts: The document contains multiple communications regarding subpoenas issued to Sprint and T-Mobile for subscriber information.
Eugene McFarlan is the primary contact from Sprint Corporate Security responding to the Palm Beach Police Department.
Dennis Duckett is the contact from T-Mobile USA who responds to a subpoena regarding customer information.
The document is subject to a protective order, limiting the disclosure of its contents.
Multiple mobile accounts and their billing information are detailed in the correspondence.
